A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ugh. The fun\, lighthearted space opera of the 70s is officially dead. Crushed under the weight of its own self-perceived importance and horrific acting. Plot? You've seen it all before - rebels gotta sneak onto the big bad ship to turn off some doohickey. Luke does chuck his lightsaber over his shoulder\, so there's that.
